snippet.title: Phantasmal: City of Darkness Trailer
snippet.description:
BUY NOW ON STEAM FOR PC!
------------------------------------------------
http://store.steampowered.com/app/342550/

Discover the feeling of utter terror in the face of the unknown in Phantasmal: City of Darkness, a survival horror game where every playthrough is completely different.  Venture through the perilous Kowloon Walled City before it’s destruction in the early 90’s.  

You will need to face off against lurking, otherworldy horrors as well as a totally unpredictable  procedurally generated environment.  You simply cannot rely on your previous experience to guarantee your safe passage.

You are fragile. Not just physically but mentally as well - the creatures will challenge your very sanity.  The odds are stacked steeply against you, but you can prevail through sheer cunning.  You will need to scavenge for resources carefully, sneak past and distract your enemies.  If you are caught, you can fight back, but don’t expect to live long.
